text:
I've always been extremely
passionate about building

things, about the
position of mankind

One of the things I
noticed while working

for six years as
a civil engineer

is the amount of pressure
that's being put on the industry

to deliver ever more
complicated and larger projects.

And one of the
things that's led to

is a gap in the
amount of technology

and the gap in the availability
of the labor market.

So my purpose in life
is to bring together

the right actors,
the right technology

to deliver the projects that
the world is desperately

asking for in a way that creates
a long term sustainable pool

of talent and technology
that makes projects

more affordable and quicker
to build for the countries
